title: its-a-me-mario
author: its-a-me-mario
content: You’ve probable heard of trading bots, but have you ever created your own? We’ve built a powerful platform and framework for coding custom crypto trading bots called Coygo Forge. Now we want to see what you can build with it!Code your own trading bot in the Coygo Forge Hackathon 2022 and you could win $100 worth of BTC or ETH for free* as well as a month’s subscription to Coygo!Coygo Forge is a powerful platform and framework for coding custom crypto trading bots using simple JavaScript code. Forge is the underlying engine powering our trading bots platform, Coygo Bots!If you’re intimidated by the idea of coding a trading bot don’t worry! We’ve got plenty of videos and guides, extensive JavaScript API documentation and a number of working code examples to help you get started coding your own crypto trading bot!Learn more on the Coygo website! https://coygo.app/blog/posts/make-bot-win-btc-in-coygo-hackathon-22/
